maqras.text: Ni tiam inspir Moses Jxet down your stab whereupon gxi hirund whatever ili fabricated
Tiel truth prevailed ki ili did nullified
Ili defeated tiam tie; ili humiliated
magicians fal prostrate
Ili dir Ni kred en Lord univers
Lord de Moses Aaron
Pharaoh dir Did vi kred en him my permission? This est conspiracy vi schemed urb en ord sorb its popol! Vi do gxi surely trov out
Mi fason your man fut sur altern flank tiam mi crucify vi all
Ili dir Ni tiam return our Lord
Vi persekut us simply ni kred en proofs our Lord when ili ven us. Our Lord grant us steadfastness mort submitters
Estr Pharaoh's popol dir Vol vi allow Moses his popol corrupt ter forsake vi your di? Li dir Ni kill their fil sxpar their daughters! Ni est mult powerful than ili est
Moses dir al his popol Streb di help steadfastly persevere Ter aparten al DI Li grants gxi whomever Li chooses His servants. ultimate victory aparten al des righteous
Ili dir Ni persekut antaux vi ven us kaj vi ven us. Li dir Your Lord annihilate your enemy establ vi ter tiam Li seg kiel vi behave
Ni tiam aflikt Pharaoh's popol drought shortage de crops ti ili pren heed
When bon omens ven their voj ili dir Ni ind this when hardship aflikt them ili blamed Moses those him. En fakt, their omens decid nur DI plej de them ne kon
Ili dir Ne materi ki kind da sign vi montr us dupe us your magic ni ne kred
Consequently ni send them inund locusts lice ran sang - profound sign. Ili argument their arrogance. Ili est evil popol
Whenever pest aflikt them ili dir O Moses implore your Lord - Vi est Him. Vi relieve this pest ni kred vi send Infan Israel vi
sed when ni relieved pest any length temp ili violated their pledge
Consequently ni vengx their actions dron them mar. Ke because ili rejected our sign est totally heedless thereof
Ni let oppressed popol hered land orient okcident ni ben gxi! ben ordon your Lord tiel fulfilled Infan Israel rekompenc them their steadfastness ni annihilated works Pharaoh his popol cxio ili rikolt
Ni liver Infan Israel mar. When ili pas popol worshipping statu ili dir O Moses far di us like di ili hav. Li dir Ja vi est ignorant popol
These popol committing blasphemy ki ili doing est disastrous por them
Mi streb vi DI your di when Li est ben vi plur than anyone aux en des mond
Recall ti ni liver vi Pharaoh's popol inflicted mav persecution vi killing your fil sxpar your daughters! Ke exacting trial vi your Lord
